artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape view of people standing and seated on blankets in a cluster of tall trees; pink-blossoming trees in middle ground; mountain peak at right; flock of flying birds, URQ; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Asukayama Hill in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
